about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Richa Info Systems is engaged in the business of assembling innovative products and systems. The company acts as an integrator of multifaceted solutions of leading quality products like Interactive Flat Panel, Interactive Board, Digital Podium, Digital Kiosk, and CCTV Cameras. The total ratio of the company's outsourcing and in-house assembling is 20:80.

The company imports raw material from China, after which it assembles the semi-finished products and installs the requisite software as per the client's requirement. The company operates manually in assembling of products and service industry and don't have any plant & machinery of its own.

Competitive Strengths:

  • ISO 9001:2015 certified company and holds a certificate under the quality system of BIC Limited (UK).
  • The experienced Promoters management team.
  • The strong brand image of the company's "Techno" brand among customers.

faqs.question: What is the Richa Info Systems IPO?
faqs.answer:
Richa Info Systems IPO is a SME IPO of 800000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹125 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on February 9, 2022, and closes on February 11, 2022.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Richa Info Systems IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Richa Info Systems IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Richa Info Systems IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Richa Info Systems IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Richa Info Systems IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Richa Info Systems IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Richa Info Systems IPO opens on February 9, 2022 and closes on February 11, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Richa Info Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: Richa Info Systems IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,25,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Richa Info Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Richa Info Systems IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Richa Info Systems IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Richa Info Systems IPO will be done on Wednesday, February 16, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 17, 2022. Check the Richa Info Systems IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Richa Info Systems IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Richa Info Systems IPO listing date is on Monday, February 21, 2022.
